about.title: About Us
about.description: AtenaAI is an intelligent educational platform
about.introName: My name is S√°vio Emmanuel, a Computer Science student interested in software development, artificial intelligence, and education.
about.introBelief: I believe AI should be a learning support tool ‚Äî never a shortcut to avoid it. This project was born from that vision: combining technology, ethics, and education in a responsible and transparent way.
about.whyPara1: Generative artificial intelligence is a recent technology still adapting, especially in traditional environments like academia.
about.whyPara2: In the university context, its use can be ignored, prohibited, or penalized, depending on the institution, discipline, or teacher's approach.
about.whyPara3: Many chatbots cross the line between supporting learning and doing the work entirely, which generates distrust and resistance from educators.
about.whyPara4: This project emerges as a balanced alternative: an educational AI, ethical and transparent, that respects the teacher's role, encourages critical thinking, and promotes real learning.
about.whatIntro: An AI-powered academic assistant, developed to support ‚Äî not replace ‚Äî the learning process. The goal is to offer responsible assistance, adapted to different educational contexts.
about.freeStudentsDesc: Controlled AI access for independent studies and content review.
about.classStudentsDesc: AI used as an explainer, with limits defined by the teacher.
about.teachersDesc: Control and monitoring view of AI use in the educational process.
about.motto: Learn with autonomy, but never alone.
about.contactSubtitle: Questions, suggestions, or interested in collaborating? Choose the best channel to talk!
